content.rendered: Hey everyone! I realized that I never made an official post about this, so here it is. A couple of months ago, I made a series of puzzles that can now be found on the puzzle tab here. Give them a try, and let me know in the comments what you think!

excerpt.rendered: Hey everyone! I realized that I never made an official post about this, so here it is. A couple of months ago, I made a series of puzzles that can now be found on the puzzle tab here. Give them a try, and let me know in the comments what you think!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Doctor Esker's Notebook Review: A Portable Puzzle Adventure
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Let's just get it out of the way: Doctor Esker's Notebook is a fantastic puzzle experience that is highly portable and a ton of fun. Recently, Plankton Games LLC sent me a copy of Doctor Esker's Notebook to review. Doctor Esker's Notebook is a puzzle game that is entirely contained…

jetpack-related-posts.title: An Escape Room that Fits Inside Your Pocket? Son of Esker's Notebook Review
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: When I heard that Dave Dobson made a sequel to Doctor Esker's Notebook, a puzzle game that I highly enjoyed, I knew that I had to try it. Check out my review of the original here: https://jorgezhang.com/2019/03/30/doctor-eskers-notebook-review-a-portable-puzzle-adventure/ A six player attempt When I played the original, I finished the game…

jetpack-related-posts.title: MUMS Puzzle Hunt Review 2019
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Julian Assange is best known for being the founder of WikiLeaks- but did you know that he also played a role in starting the Melbourne University Mathematics and Statistics Society online puzzle hunt? Julian Assange The MUMS is an online puzzle hunt made by students at Melbourne University. It is…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Cryptex Hunt 2019
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This is a Cryptex The Cryptex Hunt is AWESOME. If you enjoy puzzles, you will enjoy the Cryptex Hunt. I also participated last year, and I have to say that the Cryptex Hunt is consistently my favorite puzzle hunt of them all. Part of the reason why is the fact…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Gordian Knot Games LLC
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! In order to prepare for an upcoming kickstarter for Daggers High, I decided to start a company. I'm happy to announce Gordian Knot Games LLC! The name is inspired on a puzzle that I 3D printed with my high school's 3D printer. I was really into 3D printing…

jetpack-related-posts.title: First post!
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hello everyone, and welcome to my blog! My name is Jorge Zhang and I am a student and board game designer. Right now I am working with a friend on developing my first board game, Dagers High, and am taking a gap year before college to publish it. We are pretty…
